name: Rajat Roy
position: SDE-I @ Societe Generale | Specialized in Full Stack and Backend Solutions | IIT Kharagpur
about: I am a dedicated and results-oriented professional with a passion for leveraging my expertise in full-stack software development to deliver high-impact solutions. With over a year of hands-on experience in developing and deploying code for production environments, I am adept at utilizing my analytical acumen and technical proficiency to craft innovative software solutions that effectively address real-world challenges. My commitment to creating high-quality, efficient, and user-friendly applications drives my pursuit of excellence in every project I undertake. I am eagerly seeking opportunities to contribute my skills and expertise to dynamic teams and projects within the software development industry.

current_company.name: Societe Generale Global Solution Centre
current_company.title: SDE-I @ Societe Generale | Specialized in Full Stack and Backend Solutions | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: - Engineered a data extraction tool with a React frontend and Spring Boot backend, reducing processing time by 80% for 200,000 entries, significantly boosting operational efficiency.- Developed scalable REST APIs with NestJS and Spring Boot, ensuring seamless data exchange and enhancing system resilience for high-volume transactions.- Implemented Excel upload and bulk delete functions in NestJS, reducing data entry time by 90% and processing 10,000 entries in under 60 seconds.- Achieved 90% storage efficiency by converting Trino query results to CSV and compressing into ZIP files for S3 upload.- Enhanced system stability by 25% through role-based access, audit trails, and thorough Jest and JUnit testing, reducing post-release bugs by 40%.- Orchestrated Kubernetes and Jenkins deployment for production, maintaining 99.99% uptime and reducing release time by 40%.

recommendations: Amik Sen ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Rajat Roy during our internship, and I can confidently say that he is an exceptional software engineer. Rajat consistently demonstrated outstanding work ethics and a deep technical knowledge that significantly contributed to our team's success. Rajat's dedication to his work is evident in every task he undertakes. He approaches each project with a positive attitude and a determination to deliver high-quality results. His ability to understand complex technical concepts and apply them effectively has been a tremendous asset to our team. Whether it's debugging a tricky issue or adding new features to various applications, Rajat always finds efficient and innovative solutions. We frequently collaborated on feature additions, and I was always impressed by Rajat's ability to quickly grasp the requirements and implement them flawlessly. His proficiency in multiple programming languages and frameworks, coupled with his eagerness to stay updated with the latest industry trends, sets him apart as a top-tier software engineer. Beyond his technical skills, Rajat is a great team player. He communicates clearly, provides constructive feedback, and is always willing to lend a hand to help others. His collaborative spirit and willingness to go the extra mile make him a valuable colleague and a pleasure to work with. I wholeheartedly recommend Rajat Roy for any software engineering role. His exceptional skills, strong work ethic, and positive attitude make him a fantastic addition to any team.‚Äù

Whether it was analysing data, developing strategies, or troubleshooting issues, Rajat approached each task with diligence and a positive attitude. Beyond his technical abilities, Rajat's professionalism and reliability set him apart.
